title: Topic 002 Question 015
body: You need to monitor the resource in the subscriptions for compliance with the ISO 27001:2013 standards. The solution must minimize the effort required to modify the list of monitored policy definitions for the subscriptions.
What are two ways to achieve the goal? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: Assign an initiative to a management group.
Assign a policy to each subscription.
Assign a policy to a management group.
Assign an initiative to each subscription.
Assign a blueprint to each subscription.
Assign a blueprint to a management group.
